name: @tiddlybase/wiki-builder
description: In-browser trusted code running outside the sandbox
author: Peter Neumark

scripts.build: yarn workspace @tiddlybase/root run move_sourcemaps && yarn run build:default-build
scripts.build:default-build: yarn workspace @tiddlybase/cli run cli buildwiki -t html -p $(pwd)/../../dist/plugins -o $(pwd)/../../dist/tiddlybase_public/default-build.html $(pwd)/default-build
